name: Western Animation (Fantasy) Style LoRA
description:
Western Fantasy Animation style LoRA

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? Consider supporting me on Patreon 🅿️ or feel free to buy me a coffee ☕


Trained this from a mixed dataset between Vox Machina and Dragon Age Absolution. I thought it could be used to imitate a generic western fantasy anime style. Why not share it then? Have fun!

Should be used at around 1-1.2 weight using AnyLoRA. You can slightly alter the style with the keywords vox machina style and dragonage style. even if you should go to the dedicated models to get them perfectly.


How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight (by default it's :1)
